name: Ziye Shipiao Yixing Teapot with Phoenix Painting
description: A Zi Ni (purple clay) Yixing teapot fully handcrafted in the triangular 'Ziye Shipiao' shape, featuring a detailed phoenix clay painting. The purple clay is sourced from the original purple clay ore from Huanglong mountain. Features excellent pouring speed through the 9 hole filter.

name: White Porcelain Gaiwan, Magnolia Shape
description: A traditional Chinese tea vessel with three parts: bowl, lid, and saucer. The three parts represent heaven (lid), earth (saucer), and humanity (bowl). Designed for steeping delicate loose leaf teas such as green, white and oolong.

name: Cute Panda Tea Set with 3 Cups & Travel Bag
description: A cute panda travel tea set designed to steep Chinese tea the traditional way with playful charm. Comes with tea maker and 3 cups in a beautifully designed travel box.

name: Glass Teapot with Magnetic Filtration Infuser
description: Exquisite glass teapot featuring innovative magnetic filtration infuser. Simply place tea leaves in the infuser, then press to activate magnetic separation. Crafted from premium heat-resistant borosilicate glass with elegant wooden accents.

name: Artistic Glass Gaiwan, Flower & Butterfly Artwork
description: Glass gaiwan with flowers and butterflies dancing across its surface. Premium borosilicate glass resistant to sudden temperature changes. Optimal size for traditional kungfu tea style brewing.

name: Tiger Tea Pet
description: 100% handcrafted from Duan Ni clay with hand painting. Tigers are associated with courage, willpower and personal strength. In China, the tiger is the 3rd zodiac sign associated with honour and power.

name: Damascus Pu Erh Tea Knife
description: A pu erh tea knife made from steel, copper and solid rosewood. Damascus steel-like finish. Perfect for breaking apart compressed tea cakes.

name: Shuiping Glass Teapot
description: Shuiping shape glass teapot with ideal 200ml size for gongfu brewing. Thickened handle for comfortable hold and stainless steel spiral filter in the spout. Manually made from cooking grade borosilicate glass.

name: Ruyao Cat Tea Cup - Ru Kiln Crackle Glaze
description: White Ru kiln tea cup with hand-painted cat theme and crackle glaze finish. Handmade and traditionally fired at 1360°C (2480°F).
